configuration.name: 开工3个月未竣工项目--年限
configuration.query: SELECT YEAR(p.c_order_time) c_order_time,COUNT(p.c_id) c_count FROM t_project p INNER JOIN t_customer c ON c.c_id=p.c_customer_id WHERE DATEDIFF(IFNULL(c_end_date,NOW()),IFNULL(p.c_begin_date,p.c_order_time))>90 AND 1=1 GROUP BY YEAR(p.c_order_time)
